Header: KLN SF Commander Meets Troops Serving FMA
Content: Major General Vijitha Ravipriya, Commander, Security Forces Kilinochchi (SF-KLN) made an official visit to the Forward Maintenance Area – Kilinochchi (FMA-KLN) and its under command log units on Friday (14). On arrival at 7 Sri Lanka Army Service Corps (SLASC), Commander, SF-KLN was received by Commanding Officer, 7 SLASC after he was honoured in a drive past. Afterwards, the welcome speech was conducted by the Commander FMA - KLN.  Presentations on operational and administrative aspects of under command Log Units of the FMA - KLN were delivered by respective Commanding Officers afterwards. The event was followed by a troop address and an all rank tea at the 7 SLASC. Subsequently, the Security Force Commander visited the Headquarters of FMA - KLN, 5 Sri Lanka Corps of Military Police, 6 Sri Lanka Army Ordnance Corps, 7 Sri Lanka Electrical Mechanical Engineers and 11 Corps of Engineer Services detachments. The Comd SF - KLN planted saplings as symbols of memory and left his signature in visitors’ books to mark his visits to the places.
